3.eng-name: The Book Of The Prayer For Rain (Kitab al-Istisqa')

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas ibn Malik: Ubaydullah ibn an-Nadr reported on the authority of his father: Darkness prevailed in the time of Anas ibn Malik, I came to Anas and said (to him): AbuHamzah, did anything like this happen to you in the time of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)? He replied: Take refuge in Allah. If the wind blew violently, we would run quickly towards the mosque for fear of the coming of the Day of Judgment

chapter.eng-name: Prayer At Times Of Darkness Or Similar Occurrences
